name: VR Wheelchair Challenge
description: Every day, people go about their lives running around town completing errands such as grocery shopping, mailing letters/packages at the post office, or grabbing your favorite cup of coffee. However, we think these tasks to be trivial and pay no heed to the challenge they might impede on someone that is bound to the confines of a wheelchair. Stepping up on a curb, opening a door while holding something, or reaching the top shelf presents a whole new set of everyday obstacles for someone in this situation. Our goal was to bring about awareness to some of these challenges and with it the frustration and emotional implications that come with solving them.
